verses.text: Ach vuninal, tato tzak'och a b'a a majnan q'uen tumin yuj junok ch'oc animail t'a junok etchonhab',
van ak'anem a yaalil, ol cotcan t'a ib'anh yuj b'aj ix ak'och a b'a chi'.

Ach vuninal, icha tik tzutej a colanel a b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' winh aj tumin chi'. Ixic, emnaquil tzutej a b'a tzach tevi t'a winh, tza k'anan nivank'olal a b'ha t'a winh yic max ach yak' pural winh a tupanel sb'oc winh b'aj ix ak'och a b'a chi'.
Smoj val maxtzac ach vay yuj, mocxob' ik' ip junok rato
masanto tzach el t'a yalanh, icha val yel junok nok' k'ultaquil chej t'a junok mach pechjinac, ma icha yel junok nok' much t'a junok yaal.
Ach anima malaj a gana a munlaji, ilnab' nok' ch'equem, sik'lab'il tzila' tas syutej nok' smunlaji yic tz'ilchaj svael nok', scham val a k'ayb'an t'a nok'.
Wach'chom malaj mach schecan munlaj nok', malaj yajal nok' tz'alan yab' tas sk'ulej,
palta ayic stiempoan svael nok', syak' val yip nok' smunlaji yic smolancan svael nok' chi'.
Ach anima malaj a gana a munlaji, k'ocb'ilxo chi' tzach vayi. k'ocb'ilxo chi' tzach ek' jichan.
Yacb'an scot numumoc a vayanh, snecnecan a jolom, jeljumb'a tz'aj a k'ab', te wach' tz'aj a vayi,
haxo tz'aji, scot meb'ail t'a ib'anh, ste b'at t'a ib'anh icha junok winh elk'um ed'jinac junok q'uen cuchilub'.
Ha eb' chuk spensar, anhej es tzek' yal eb' t'a skal eb' anima.
Smutz'mutz'an sat eb' yak'an yechel, sch'oxanpax eb' yet' yiximal sk'ab'.
Junelnhej te chuk spensar eb', axonhej malaj swach'il sna sk'ulej eb'. Ha b'aj tzek' eb', anhej oval sq'ekan vaan yuj eb'.
Yuj chi' elanhchamel ol ja yaelal t'a yib'anh eb'. Junnhej mutz'satil ol aj slajviem eb', manhxa tas ol yal yuj eb'.

Ay uque' tas chacb'ilel yuj Jehov√° t'a junelnhej: Aton ik'ojchanhb'ail, esalvumal, mak'ojcham anima malaj smul, naojchaanh tas malaj swach'il, chukal sk'ulaji, ak'ojoch es t'a yib'anh junocxo mach yet' ik'ojchaanh oval t'a skal anima.
Ach vuninal, sik'kan juntzanh in k'ayb'ub'al tik t'a a pensar yet' a k'ayb'ub'al syak' ix a nun.
Sik'kan t'a a pensar, naannhejocab' uuj t'a masanil tiempo.
Ha ol ach cuchb'an b'aj ol ach ek'oc, manh ol ach xivoc ayic ol ach vayoc. Ayic ol el a vayanh, anheja' juntzanh tik naan uuj.
D'a val yel a a cachnab'il yet' a k'ayb'ub'al tik, icha sacq'uinal yaj t'ayach. Ha a cachnab'il chi' yet' a pensar tzach cuchb'anb'at t'a sb'eal q'uinal.
Ha ol ach colanel t'a yol sk'ab' ix ix chuk spensar yet' ix ayxo winh yetb'eyum to te wach' smontan yet' slolonel.
Manh ak'och a pensar t'a swach'il yilji ix, manh a cha somchajel a k'ool yuj chajtil tzach aj yilanoch ix.
Ha mach smulan yet' ix ajmul ix, scot meb'ail t'a yib'anh, haxo mach smontaj yuj ix ay yetb'eyum yic smulan ix yet'oc, syik'cot chamel t'a yib'anh.
Q'uinaloc ay junok mach tz'ik'anb'at te' tzak'ak' t'a snhi' sk'ool, max ek'b'atlaj stz'ab'at spichul yuj te'.
Ha mach sb'ey t'a yib'anh te' tzak'ak', max ek'b'atlaj stz'ab'at yoc yuj te'.
Ha mach smulan yet' ix ix ay yetb'eyum chi', yowalil scot t'a yib'anh.
Tato ay junok elk'um tz'elk'an junok tasi yujto ay svejel, tzato naji val t'a yib'anh,
palta wach'chom icha chi', tato syamchaji, yowalil uquel tz'aj stupan tas ix yelq'uej chi', taxonhej manhxalaj tas skan t'ay.
Tato ay mach tzek' yet' ix ayxo winh yetb'eyum, yelxo val malaj jab'oc spensar. Ha mach icha chi' sk'ulej, anhej syak' lajvoc sb'a.
Ol scha syaelal, ol mak'jocpaxi, manhxa b'ak'uinh ol b'at sq'uixvelal chi' satk'olal yuj eb' anima.
Ha winh ix ixtaj ix yetb'eyum chi', te ov winh icha te tzak'ak', manh jab'oc syak' nivank'olal winh ayic sk'och stiempoal yak'anek' spak winh.
Ha silab' winh ay smul chi' syak' t'a winh, max schalaj winh, wach'chom te niwan silab' chi', palta max yak'laj nivank'olal winh.
